title: Chili Mac & Cheese
directions: In a large pot over medium heat, heat oil. Add onion and cook until tender, then add garlic and stir until fragrant, 1 minute. Add ground beef and cook until no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Drain fat.
Add diced tomatoes, kidney beans, chili powder, cumin, cayenne pepper, chicken broth, and pasta and bring to a simmer. Simmer until pasta is al dente, 14 to 15 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in cheddar until just melted.
ingredients: 12 oz. pasta, such as orecchiette or shells
